short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A button to quickly open Go playground. Don't forget to PIN IT in the top right corner after installing the extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Run Go playground in a new adjacent tab. 
Don't forget to PIN BUTTON in the top right corner after installing the extension.
